select si.si_idx, si.target_name, si.target_cat_name, si.target_cost_value, si.loc_code, si.si_title, si.mobile_url, si.si_end_dt, si.view_cnt, mb.mb_save_yn, mb.mb_req_save_yn, mb.mb_done_save_yn, tl.tl_cret_dt from ( select tl_type_cd, tl_cret_id , max(tl_cret_dt) as tl_cret_dt from itda_app.time_line where 1=1 and tl_type_cd != 0 and tl_cret_id = #{user_id} group by tl_type_cd, tl_cret_id , date_trunc('year',tl_cret_dt) order by tl_cret_dt desc ) tl left outer join itda_app.support_info si on tl.tl_type_cd = si.si_idx left join itda_app.my_bookmark mb on si.si_idx = mb.mb_addidx and mb.mb_idx = ( select mb_idx from itda_app.my_bookmark where 1=1 and mb_cret_id = #{user_id} and mb_addidx = si.si_idx order by mb_cret_dt desc limit 1 )
order by view_cnt desc
order by target_cost_value desc
order by si_end_dt

select * from itda_app.my_bookmark mb left outer join itda_app.support_info si on mb.mb_addidx = si.si_idx where 1=1 and mb.mb_cret_id = #{user_id} and si.si_active_yn = 'Y'
and mb.mb_save_yn ='Y'
and mb.mb_req_save_yn = 'Y'
and mb.mb_done_save_yn = 'Y'
order by
view_cnt desc
target_cost_value desc
si_end_dt
mb.mb_updt_dt desc

select si.target_cat_name, count(*) from itda_app.my_bookmark mb left outer join itda_app.support_info si on mb.mb_addidx = si.si_idx where 1=1 and mb.mb_cret_id = #{mb_cret_id} and mb.mb_save_yn = 'Y' group by si.target_cat_name

insert into itda_web.user_need (user_id, financing, team_building, etc) values (#{user_id}, #{financing}, #{team_building}, #{etc})
